snippet: A contractor was not insured to use the sculptor’s preferred method for part of the work, putting in doubt whether the repairs will be finished before the 50th anniversary of the March on Washington.
abstract: Contractor repairing Martin Luther King Jr Memorial is not insured to use sculptor's preferred method for work, putting in doubt whether repairs will be finished in time for 50th anniversary of March on Washington for Jobs and Freedom.
lead_paragraph: A contractor was not insured to use the sculptor’s preferred method for part of the work, putting in doubt whether the repairs will be finished before the 50th anniversary of the March on Washington.

headline.main: As March’s 50th Anniversary Nears, King Memorial Repairs May Be Delayed
headline.print_headline: As March’s 50th Anniversary Nears, King Memorial Repairs May Be Delayed
